str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
A dwelling; by implication, a family.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From kata and a derivative of skeuos; to prepare thoroughly; by implication, to construct, create.
A primary preposition; under, i.e. of place, or with verbs; of place (underneath) or where (below) or time (when).

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Genitive Masculine Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Verb - Aorist Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: From kata and a derivative of skeuos; to prepare thoroughly; by implication, to construct, create.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
